channel.title: org-mode on Grey Book
channel.description: Recent content in org-mode on Grey Book

item.title: Org Mode Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Org Mode syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme. These are rendered slightly differently to those when creating content using Markdown, so this page acts as a comparison to the Markdown Syntax page.
